Detailed Description

An ItemModelFileEditor load and unload the content model editor when reading the device. The content model is based on a FileContentParser and some FileContentElement.

TextEditor *  editor = 0,
QWidget *  parent = 0 
)

Create the ItemModelFileEditor. This editor add the notion of model.
